titles.title: First Amendment Restoration Act
To restore first amendment protections of religion and speech.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/27/2000--Introduced. First Amendment Restoration Act - Denies jurisdiction to the U.S. district courts, the District Court of Guam, District Court of the Virgin Islands, the District Court of the Northern Mariana Islands, and the U.S. Court of Federal Claims to hear or determine religious freedom-related cases.
